remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. See .See . 如需其他備註應該使用列舉值。for other remarks about how enumerators should be used.
